name: Wyle's Loop
description:
A simple 2D vertical platformer where you replay the same level becoming more difficult each loop forcing you to beat it differently until you can escape the loop. You play as Wyle, an adventurer trying to escape his loop.

If you get stuck anywhere you can press R to reset

We're two friends that like to code and decided to make a game. This is our first game we have both made to completion and our first time in Ludum Dare 47. We had a great time and can't wait for the next one.

Ludum Dare Link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/wyles-loop

Creators:

Tryston Minsquero @tryston

Michael Bettes @michbet

Please enjoy!
